name: INGetReservationDetailsIntent
desc: A request for details about one or more reservations.

items.name: init(reservationContainerReference: INSpeakableString?, reservationItemReferences: [INSpeakableString]?)
items.desc: Creates an intent that describes the reservation.

items.name: var reservationContainerReference: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: A unique identifier for the array containing the reservation objects.

items.name: var reservationItemReferences: [INSpeakableString]?
items.desc: An array of unique identifiers for previously created reservations.
